test-case.name: Verify user can update number of guests on Home page

step.title: Given I am on Hotels.com home page0211

step.name: And I Select first child age: 4

step.name: And I Select second child age: Under 1

step.name: And I Select third child age: 7

step.name: Then I Verify total number of guests in sum of adults and children as same as selected on step #3 and #4.
